programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: After spilling an experiment of Lisa's, Lincoln sets off a chain reaction in 'The Butterfly Effect', then in 'The Green House', Lincoln urges his family to stop using so much electricity. (S1, ep 11)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln is given the responsibility of taking home the class tarantula in 'Along Came a Sister', then in 'Chore and Peace', Lincoln goes on strike until someone will swap chores with him. (S1, ep 12)

programme.title: The Loud House

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Man Ray rents Squidward's house, so SpongeBob and Patrick must stop his vacation in 'Man Ray Returns', then in 'Larry the Floor Manager', Mr. Krabs takes a vacation and hires a temporary manager.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Clumsy decides that the sky is the place to be in 'Flying Ace', then in 'Lab Assistant', when Brainy gets hurt, Papa Smurf asks Monkey to take Brainy's place as his assistant. (S1, ep 21)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Vanity's magic causes a problem in 'Leaping Lizards', then in 'Cover Story', to increase interest in the newspaper, Reporter decides to interview Gargamel face to face! (S1, ep 23)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Squidward joins a crew of sailors hunting down the great white jellyfish. Plankton finds a magic bean that takes him to a land of giants (well, more giant than usual).

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Handy invents a camera for Painter in 'Say Smurf for the Camera!', and in 'Manners Matter', Papa Smurf is nervous about the Nature Fairy's visit, so asks Willow to teach the Smurfs manners. (S2, ep 1)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Wild stays in Papa Smurf's house in 'The Guest Who Wouldn't Leave', then in 'Where's My Smurfway?', Blossom misplaces Brainy's beloved Smurfway, and has to find it before Brainy finds out. (S2, ep 2)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob doesn't need a licence to operate a self-driving car in 'Drive Happy', then in 'Old Man Patrick', Patrick thinks he's an old man, so SpongeBob reminds him how much fun being a kid can be.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick exchange tiny living versions of themselves in 'Fun-Sized Friends', then in 'Grandmum's the Word', Plankton tells his Grandma that he owns the Krusty Krab!

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Dad worries Lola thinks he plays favourites in 'Home of the Fave', and in 'Hero Today, Gone Tomorrow', Lynn must be supportive when Lynn's friend is celebrated for a one-in-a-million goal.(S3, ep 23)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lucy quits the writing club at school in 'The Write Stuff', then in 'Racing Hearts', Luna and Sam discover they have less in common than they thought. (S3, ep 24)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: The Stars run a Patrick Show theme park in their home in 'Patrick Show Land', then in 'Legend of the Lost Bathroom', Patrick and Squidina embark on a quest to find the lost bathroom. (S3, ep 4)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: In an episode about boats, Cecil teaches Patrick how to drive in 'Driven to Drive', then in 'A Patty in Time', Patrick time-travels in a race for the Krusty Krab's newest menu item. (S3, ep 5)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Z's All That: Phoebe & Max get to act as a superhero mentor to one of their siblings, but quickly regret selecting Nora after seeing Billy's surprisingly impressive skillset. (S4, ep 17)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Toon In For Danger: When Henry and Ray get a copy of the new Kid Danger & Captain Man cartoon and see that it's horrible, they must hurry to fix the cartoon before the big premiere party. (S4, ep 11)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Monkey goes looking for a star for Papa Smurf in 'Reaching for the Stars', then in 'The Dream Team', Handy puts together an A-team to get his jet pack back from Gargamel's hovel. (S3, ep 8)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Scaredy discovers the forest in 'The Tour', and then in 'Smurfing a Masterpiece', Baby Smurf is the new Painter! (S3, ep 9)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Squidina hires an assistant who's a little too good at his job in 'Squidina's Little Helper', then in 'I Smell a Pat', The Patrick Star Show is interrupted by a most peculiar stench. (S1, ep 5)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Leni is put in charge of the school's prom in 'Prom-Com', then in 'Scene Steeler', Lincoln and Clyde cast Luan as the villain in their film and have to deal with her method acting. (S9, ep 5)

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: Cracking Down: Sonic tells Nine about Ghost Hill, its shard, and its blueprint to reassemble the Paradox Prism to restart the real world. But all Nine hears is that there's a fourth shard. (S1, ep 15)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Squidward finds a good book which happens to be SpongeBob's private diary, in 'Little Yellow Book', and then in 'Bumper to Bumper', Mrs. Puff is again teaching SpongeBob to drive.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: No Friend In Sight: Chloe feels smothered by Max and Phoebe, and encourages them to make new friends. However, the twins unwittingly make the same friend, and begin a battle over her. (S1, ep 9)

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: The Two Charlies: While staking out Raquel at Rock Island Dam, the gang are visited by two versions of Uncle Charlie - one younger and one older. And they're all in serious danger. (S2, ep 16)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: The Great Cactus Con: Jasper gets the chance to take his crush to Cactus Con. When a mysterious villain gets involved the entire gang is forced into action! (S5, ep 5)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Part 1 - A New Evil: Henry is trapped at home with his family while Captain Man heads out alone to save the founder of TwitFlash. Meanwhile, Charlotte and Schwoz put together a mystery. (S5, ep 6)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Robin Hood - Prince of Pheebs: When Chloe announces that Max is her favourite, Phoebe tells a bedtime story about the great Phoebe Hood and the evil Maxingham. (S3, ep 25)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Aunt Misbehavin': Max & Phoebe give their mom the ultimate birthday surprise by tracking down her long lost sister, but then they discover that they've been feuding for years. (S3, ep 19)

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Hey, Where's Schwoz?: Danger Force sets out to rescue Schwoz who's been kidnapped. With help from a familiar Swellview villain, the kids try to take out an evil collective along the way. (S3, ep 7)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Andre's Horrible Girl: Tori notices changes in her friend Andre, whose girlfriend is overbearing and controlling. Jade and Cat try to earn money dog-sitting in Beverly Hills. (S3, ep 4)

programme.title: Popularity Papers
programme.desc: New School, New Start: On the first day of middle school, Lydia and Julie's plans to become popular girls are thwarted, prompting the question "Does being fashionable make you popular"? (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: The Thumb Buddies: Captain Man and Kid Danger get jealous when a new crime-fighting team emerges in Swellview. Guest starring Jerry Trainor. (S4, ep 13)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Saturday Night Lies: When Ray runs into an ex-girlfriend, he tries to impress her by pretending that Henry, Charlotte, and Jasper are his children. (S4, ep 14)

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Tide and Prejudice: The Thundermans are visited by High Tide, the former protector of Secret Shores. He decides to take back his old role, even if it puts Jinx and Booch in danger. (S1, ep 11)

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Prank U Next: Max seeks help dealing with a mystery prankster at school from his old principal, who was always the target of his pranks. But Max fails to stop the pranks, and quits! (S1, ep 13)

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: The Cave To Everywhere - Part 1: On the day of the ball, Taylor is convinced her Uncle Charlie is trying to make contact. She sets off on a dangerous scavenger hunt to retrieve his message. (S2, ep 1)

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: The Cave To Everywhere - Part 2: On the day of the Rock Island Ball, Taylor is convinced her Uncle Charlie is trying to make contact. (S2, ep 2)

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Manlee Men: Captain Man's a diva at the 100th Annual Swellview Fashion Show. With help from some fashion forward twins, Danger Force find the mystery behind Captain Man's runway return. (S1, ep 25)

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Manlee Men: Captain Man's a diva at the 100th Annual Swellview Fashion Show. With help from some fashion forward twins, Danger Force find the mystery behind Captain Man's runway return. (S1, ep 25)

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel faces the Wish Trials in 'Department of Magical Violations', then in 'Teacher's Pal', Hazel wishes her teachers were friends. (S1, ep 2)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: He Got Game Night: Hank raises the stakes of family game night to a new high, and each member of the family will do whatever it takes to win the grand prize. (S3, ep 15)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Kiss Me, Nate: Max is nervous when his girlfriend auditions for the romantic lead opposite a cute boy in the school play, and he convinces Phoebe to audition for the same role. (S3, ep 16)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Indestructible Henry - Part 1: When Kid Danger is almost badly injured on a mission, Henry decides to go through the Densitizer and become indestructible like Captain Man. (S2, ep 10)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Indestructible Henry - Part 2: Henry decides to go through the Densitizer and become indestructible like Captain Man. But things don't turn out quite the way he hopes. (S2, ep 11)

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: Showdown: In a final epic showdown in the tunnels under Hunter House, the Hunters must stop Miss Lucas before she brainwashes the whole of Amsterdam. (S4, ep 20)

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: Blondie the Spy-cat: Milady loves Jane Blondie's movies, and one day, to her surprise, Jane Blondie involves Milady in a secret mission to find out who's behind the dangerous Cat X. (S2, ep 33)

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: Wild and Brave: Pilou, Ginny and Scribbly spend a day out in the wilderness with Tata and Jungle, ready to teach their puppies how to handle themselves like good wild cats. (S2, ep 34)

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: The Winter Buffolympics: Lampo and Boss compete at the Winter Buffolympics organized by Olympio, a series of snow sports trials with special guests the meowtiful Pinky Paws. (S2, ep 35)

programme.title: Best & Bester
programme.desc: Diamondo refuses to give the twins a ride in his spaceship in 'In the Sky with Diamondo', and in 'Best Buddies', things get awkward when Best pretends to know someone he's never met. (S1, ep 16)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Patrick becomes a superhero in 'Patrick-Man!', and then in 'Gary's New Toy', Gary becomes obsessed with his new red ball, forcing SpongeBob to take drastic measures to intervene.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob is forced to go back to the milkshake academy in 'License to Milkshake', and then in 'Squid Baby', SpongeBob and Patrick must look after Squidward after he hits his head.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Vanity gives one of the Smurfs a makeover in 'Papa Times Two', then in 'Fake News', Jokey tricks Poet into writing a sensational (but very fake) news story in the Daily Smurf. (S1, ep 24)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Clumsy and Dimwitty get into a big fight in 'You're Fired!', then in 'Mirror, Mirror on the Armoire', when Gargamel places a magic armoire in the forest, Vanity must resist temptation. (S1, ep 25)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob befriends a talking Krabby Patty whose only wish is to be eaten in 'My Friend Patty', then in 'Fun-Believable', Rube explores little known oddities and attractions around Bikini Bottom.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Granny Tentacles helps Squidward collect his paper delivery money from Cecil in 'Backpay Payback', then in 'House Hunting', The Star family house runs away from home. (S1, ep 16)

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: Cracking Down: Sonic tells Nine about Ghost Hill, its shard, and its blueprint to reassemble the Paradox Prism to restart the real world. But all Nine hears is that there's a fourth shard. (S1, ep 15)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Ditch Day: Max and Phoebe use their powers on Ditch Day, but when they remember the school has security cameras, they get Billy and Nora's help to keep their secret a secret! (S1, ep 7)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Stuck In Two Holes: Captain Man and Kid Danger are each stuck in a hole? Charlotte and Jasper had better go help, because Schwoz is taking a bean bath! (S3, ep 17)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Painter finds a new subject to paint in 'Mommy's Masterpiece', then in 'A Thief Among Us!', the Smurfs' favourite things start disappearing all over the village. (S2, ep 4)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Ogre Love: Big Mouth falls in love with Smurfette after she pulls a splinter from his thumb. (S2, ep 5)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Anything SpongeBob and Patrick draw comes to life in the 'Doodle Dimension', then in 'Move Your Bubble Bass', SpongeBob and Patrick help Bubble Bass move out of his mother's basement.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob wants to dive all the way up to the surface of the ocean in 'High Sea Diving', then in 'Bottle Burglars', SpongeBob and Squidward accidentally let Plankton steal the secret formula!

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Luan tries out for the school play in 'Stage Plight', then in 'Antiqued Off', Lincoln feels like a third wheel when Clyde and Zach begin bonding over a mutual interest in antiques. (S3, ep 25)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Cooked!: The kids promise to help Dad with the grand opening of his new restaurant by coming up with promotions. Their lack of teamwork and crazy promos lead to a nightmare in the kitchen! (S3, ep 26)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick helps with Squidward's paper route in 'Pat-per Route', then in 'Day of the Dartfish', The Dartfish family finds a thief. (S3, ep 6)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: The show finds an adorable new star in 'Patty-Poo', then in 'Swaptoberfest', the Star family swap identities. (S3, ep 7)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Can't Hardly Date: As Sarah & Gideon's crushes on Max & Phoebe escalate, the twins set them up on a date with each other to solve the problem once and for all. (S4, ep 30)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Car Trek: Charlotte's birthday road trip to see the Boo Man Group perform gets sidetracked by a Captain Man and Kid Danger emergency. (S4, ep 12)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Lily and Farmer have to save the village from a slobbering monster in 'Monster in the Village', then in 'Granny's Doll', Rowena is turned into Smurfette and takes her place in the village. (S3, ep 10)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Smurfette and Grouchy compete to decide who is the best in 'The Battle of the Sitters', and in 'Let's Smurf To Mars', Blossom dreams of going to Mars and can count on her friends to help. (S3, ep 11)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: The Star Family heads to their favourite resort in 'Gas Station Vacation', then in 'Bunny the Barbarian', Bunny goes on a mid-day adventure to a forgotten age. (S1, ep 6)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Camped!: When Dad discovers that his childhood camp is closing, he decides to take the family for one final visit. They uncover a map that could lead to a treasure big enough to save it. (S5, ep 18)

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: Ghost of a Chance: The full Chaos Council gears up for all-out war in Ghost Hill. Shadow worries about leaving Nine to rebuild the prism. Sonic insists Nine is a friend. (S1, ep 16)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob finds a nasty sea urchin living in the Krusty Krab in 'Eek, An Urchin!', and then in 'Squid's Defense', Squidward convinces SpongeBob and Sandy to teach him karate.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: All About Steve: Billy hopes that his new sidekick Steve can join the T-Force. Phoebe and Max consider it, but soon discover that his superpower is making marshmallows. (S1, ep 10)

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: Journey to the Bottom of the Island: Taylor, Meesha and Ellis are accidentally trapped underwater in the Institute's new submersible. (S2, ep 17)

programme.title: Henry Danger

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Part 3 - A New Hero: Schwoz works to create an anti-virus while Kid Danger and Captain Man battle a villain. Kid Danger's heroism is put to the test as they fight to save the world. (S5, ep 8)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Stealing Home: Hank and Phoebe think the house has been robbed when they discover the furniture missing, but Max admits he hid everything and forces them to earn it all back. (S3, ep 24)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Back to School: Back in elementary school to complete a hero assessment, Phoebe & Max realize that it won't be easy when the instructor is a former classmate that Max tormented. (S3, ep 20)

programme.title: Danger Force

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Car, Rain and Fire: When Cat's favourite actress dies, she talks Tori and Jade into driving to the actress' house to hold a vigil. Also, Trina directs a play starring herself. (S3, ep 5)

programme.title: Popularity Papers

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Dinner Party: Max plans to sabotage dinner when Phoebe invites her crush's family over to impress them, but when an unexpected guest arrives, the evening could become a disaster! (S1, ep 2)

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: The Message: Reeling from the shock of events at the ball, Taylor puts her concerns aside and focuses her efforts on decoding the rest of Uncle Charlie's message. (S2, ep 3)

programme.desc: Bling Bling Bear: Inspired by a magazine showing a man offering a diamond to a woman, Grizzy imagines himself offering the ranger's engagement ring to his beloved she-bear. (S1 Ep44)

programme.desc: Intellectual Bear: When he accidentally sticks a computer microprocessor to his head, Grizzy is transformed into a being capable of predicting events to come far in advance. (S1 Ep45)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Voodoo Blanket: The Lemmings prepare a dream afternoon snack with the last jar of chocolate spread in the cupboard. (S1 Ep46)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Prints: Grizzy discovers that he can print images taken with the ranger's camera which is connected to a state-of-the-art printer. (S1 Ep47)

programme.desc: Inspector Grizzy: A van pulls up to the ranger's cabin to deliver a crate of chocolate spread. While Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a wrecking bar to open it, someone steals the crate. (S1 Ep48)

programme.desc: Lemmings Indigestion: The Lemmings have got their hands on a pack of white beans which have very strange properties: when mixed with soda, anyone who eats them turns into a bouncing ball. (S1 Ep50)

programme.desc: Sonata in Bear Major: Grizzy wants to get rid of the old piano in the garage at any cost, for the Lemmings love using it to make a racket. (S1 Ep51)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Fractions: The Lemmings find a crate from an army convoy transporting ultra-secret material that divides objects into multiple miniaturised versions of themselves. (S1 Ep52)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Crash Training Course: Grizzy finds a gadget that enables you to learn anything. He can now become the perfect bear! But first, he needs to learn how to get rid of the Lemmings. (S1 Ep54)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Mass Control: While searching for the television remote control, Grizzy discovers a gadget that controls various functions in the cabin. (S1 Ep7)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Role Change: After receiving a terrible blow over the head, Grizzy is no longer the same: he thinks he's a rodent! (S1 Ep11)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Random Bear: Grizzy and the lemmings fight over chocolate-spread jar lids, which they use as chips in a competition to win goodies. (S1 Ep16)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings

programme.title: Blociau Rhif
programme.desc: Hwyl a sbri i blant ifanc gyda'r blociau rhif. Fun and games for young children with the number blocks.

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Thomas the Tank and friends.

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae Bethan a Caleb yn chwarae gyda barcud. Tybed a fydd Twt yn gallu eu helpu? Bethan and Caleb are flying a kite. Will Twt have any success with the kite when he has a go?

programme.title: Blero yn Mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Mae Blero wrth ei fodd efo balwns o bob lliw a llun, ac mae o am gael gwybod pam eu bod yn hedfan ymhell, bell i'r awyr. Blero wants to know what makes balloons float up high into the sky.

programme.title: Kim a Cêt a Twrch
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Kim a Cêt ar antur hudolus a chwareus sy'n llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am Twrch yn y goedwig. Join Kim and Cêt on a magical adventure full of fun.

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Mae Odo a Dwdl yn esgus bod yn Brifswyddog Wdl i gynorthwyo'r gwersyll i ennill Gwobr y Fesen Euraidd. Odo and Doodle pretend to be Inspector Oodle to help the camp win a Golden Acorn Award.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Yn antur heddiw mae Mabli yn arch arwr. All hi helpu ei ffrindiau ac achub y dydd? On today's poptastic adventure, Mabli becomes a superhero! Can she help her friends and save the day?

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni
programme.desc: Heddiw: ymweliad ag Asia ac Ynysoedd y Philipinau - gwlad sydd wedi ei gwneud o 700 o ynysoedd. We visit the Philippines' capital city Manila and see its unique Jeepney minibuses.

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Pan fydd Lili yn creu persawr sy'n ei gneud hi'n gyflymach na Jetboi mae yntau'n sylweddoli bod ateb arall heblaw cyflymder. Lili creates a speed perfume that makes her faster than Jetboi.

programme.title: Sigldigwt
programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Ymunwch gyda Tref y ci, Elin a Berian wrth iddynt edrych ar ôl pob math o anifeiliaid gyda help eu ffrindiau ifanc. Gwesty Sigldigwt is open! Come join us!

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Mae Gyrdi yn wych am dwtio, a dweud y gwir mae Gyrdi yn rhy dda! Dydy'r Olobobs ddim yn gallu dod o hyd i unrhyw beth! Gyrdi is very good at tidying up - but the Olobobs can't find anything!

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Dewch ar antur gyda ni i gwrdd ag anifeiliaid bach y byd. Yn y rhaglen hon, y ddafad a'r carw sy'n cael ein sylw. In this programme, we get to know the sheep and the deer.

programme.title: Y Diwrnod Mawr
programme.desc: Ar ei ddiwrnod mawr bydd Daragh yn dilyn yn ol troed ei arwr Hedd Wyn. World War I soldier poet Hedd Wyn is Daragh's hero. What will he learn about the famous poet during his big day?

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Ar ôl chwarae'n y glaw, mae Pablo'n hapus, ond eto'n drist wrth orffen. Mae'n sylweddoli y gall deimlo mwy nag un peth ar unwaith. Pablo experiences different feelings playing in the rain.

programme.title: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Mae Harri'n cael galwad i ddweud fod gan Elin Fflur deiar fflat ar ei char, felly ffwrdd a fo i Langefni i'w drwsio. Harri gets a call to say that Elin Fflur's car has a flat tyre.

programme.title: Cymylaubychain
programme.desc: Mae Enfys wedi llwyddo i glymu ei hun yn gwlwm ac felly mae'n rhaid i'r Cymylaubychain ei helpu gyda'r gwaith. Rainbow is in a knot and needs some help.

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Mae na fraw ac ofn ymysg tyrchod Cwmtwrch heddiw wrth i olion anghenfil gael eu gweld ar hyd y lle. All the moles of Cwmtwrch are scared today as there are traces of a monster lurking.

programme.title: Jambori
programme.desc: Dewch gyda Jam ar daith llawn synau, cerddoriaeth a lluniau lliwgar - bydd cysgodion yn dawnsio a robotiaid yn chwarae! Join Jam on a musical adventure with interesting sounds and pictures!

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae'n Galan Gaea ac mae Crawc yn dweud fod ganddo fwci-bo. Yn y diwedd, mae ei ffrindiau yn darganfod mai jôc oedd y cwbwl, ife? It's Halloween and Toad boasts of a ghost in Toad Hall.

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Huw a chriw o ffrindiau yn adeiladu rafft, ac fe gawn ni gwrdd a Hetti a'i cheffyl, Bunny. Today, Meleri will be meeting Megan and a lot of pigeons!

programme.title: Blociau Rhif
programme.desc: Hwyl a sbri i blant ifanc gyda'r blociau rhif. Fun and games for young children with the number blocks.

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Tomos a'i ffrindiau heddiw? What's happening in Tomos and friends' world today?

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae straeon Twt yn mynd yn rhy bell ac yn arwain at broblemau i'w ffrindiau yn yr harbwr. Twt's storytelling gets out of hand and creates some problems for his friends in the harbour

programme.title: Blero yn Mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Mae Blero'n clywed aderyn bach yn canu y tu allan i'w 'stafell, ond tydi o ddim yn deall be' mae'r aderyn yn ei ddweud. Blero hears a chirping bird but he can't understand what he's saying.

programme.title: Kim a Cêt a Twrch
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Kim a Cêt ar antur hudolus a chwareus sy'n llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am Twrch yn y goedwig. Join Kim and Cêt on a magical and playful adventure.

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Mae Dwdl yn ceisio osgoi cwestiynau Odo am ei mam. Ond ar ol cael gwahoddiad adre, mae'n brofiad annisgwyl iawn. After meeting Doodle's mum, Odo has an unexpected experience.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ma Mabli ofn disgyn oddi ar ei beic newydd - a fydd hi'n gallu gorffen beicio gyda'i ffrindiau? Mabli worries she might fall off her new bike - will she finish the bike trail with her crew?

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni
programme.desc: Mae Costa Rica yn enwog am goedwigoedd cwmwl sy'n gartref i fywyd gwyllt egsotig fel y twcan a'r diogyn. Hefyd byddwn yn ymweld â'r brifddinas, San José. We take a trip to Costa Rica.

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Wedi i Peredur Plagus ddwyn pob copi o rifyn newydd Panda Prysur, mae Jetboi a Dan Jerus yn dysgu cydweithio er mwyn ei drechu. Jetboi and Dan Jerus work together to defeat Peredur Plagus.

programme.title: Sigldigwt
programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Heddiw cawn gwrdd â sawl ci bach ac Enfys a'i moch cwta.Today we meet some cute puppies and Enfys and her guinea pigs.

programme.desc: Yn y bennod yma, byddwn yn cyfarfod cynllunydd theatr dawnus, ac yn dysgu am ddrymiau ym Mhont-y-clun. Today, we learn about the history of zines, and take a walk around Merthyr Tydfil.

programme.title: Rownd a Rownd
programme.desc: Mae Anna wedi cyrraedd pen ei thennyn. Mae hi mewn trafferthion mawr ac wyr hi ddim beth i'w wneud. When Mair, Beca and Ioan discover what Anna is planning, they decide to tell Elen.

programme.title: Sam Tân

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Cyfres gomedi i blant meithrin sy'n cynnwys sgetsys, eitemau doniol, jôcs a chymeriadau dwl newydd sbon. A comedy show for pre-school children, full of sketches, jokes and fun!

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae Mario'n gofalu am Elis, ci Sam Spratt, ond cyn pen dim mae'r ci bach yn rhedeg i ffwrdd. A ddaw Mario o hyd iddo cyn i Sam ddychwelyd? Mario has been left in charge of Sam Spratt's dog!

programme.title: Asra
programme.desc: Bydd plant o Ysgol Craig y Deryn yn ymweld ag ASRA yr wythnos hon. Children from Ysgol Craig y Deryn visit Asra this week.

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Mae plant bach wrth eu bodd yn creu ystumiau gyda'u cyrff. Dyma gân am anturiaethau bonheddwr ar gefn ei geffyl. This song is about the adventures of a nobleman riding his horse!

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Wrth hedfan efo Glenys un bore mae Teifion yn cael damwain ddrwg ac yn codi o'r llwyni wedi anghofio pwy yw e. Teifion crash-lands one morning and rises from the bushes wondering who he is.

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Mae Ben Dant ar antur newydd i ailgylchu a throi sbwriel yn sbeshal, a gwastraff yn gampwaith. Today, Ben Dant will be joining pupils at Ysgol Y Traeth to create excellent treasure.

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Ar ôl i Guto wneud addewid byrbwyll er mwyn tawelu Tomi Broch, mae o a'i ffrindiau yn gorfod gwingo eu ffordd allan o sefyllfa anodd! Guto makes a rash promise to please an angry Tomi Broch.

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Tyle`r Ynn sy'n ymuno â Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Tyle`r Ynn join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: Cywion Bach
programme.desc: Ar ôl diwrnod o hwyl a chwarae, mae'r Cywion Bach wrth eu bodd yn mynd i'r gwely. Today, they learn the word 'gwely' and see what sort of bed dolly and rabbit have.

programme.title: Og y Draenog Hapus
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Og a'i ffrindiau heddiw? What's happening in the world of Og and friends today?

programme.title: Deian a Loli
programme.desc: Mae Deian a Loli'n brysur yn gwneud Origami, ond ar ol rhewi eu rhieni, ma'r origami yn dod yn fyw! After freezing their parents, the twins are shocked to see their origami come to life!

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Mae'r Octonots yn dod ar draws llyffaint dart gwenwynig ar ôl i eger llanw peryglus daro'r Amason. The Octonauts find out about poison dart frogs after a tidal bore sweeps up the Amazon.

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Mae angen tomato ar Betsan a Leisa ar gyfer pizza maent yn ei wneud felly mae Hywel y ffermwr hud yn eu helpu. Betsan and Leisa need a tomato to put on a homemade pizza and visit the farm.

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach
programme.desc: Yn y rhaglen yma byddwn yn dysgu am y pedwar tymor - y Gwanwyn, yr Haf, tymor yr Hydref a'r Gaeaf. In this programme we'll learn about the four seasons - Spring, Summer, Autumn and Winter.

programme.title: Sali Mali
programme.desc: Mae Tomos Caradog yn rhy fach i neud lot o bethe, ond mae o'r maint perffaith i gyrraedd dîs sy'n mynd ar goll. Tomos Caradog is too small to do many things but is perfect for some things!

programme.title: Jen a Jim a'r Cywiadur
programme.desc: Mae Cyw a Llew yn gwerthu pysgod a sglodion o fan fwyd ar y traeth. Cyw and Llew are selling fish and chips from a food van on the beach. But where has the vinegar gone?

programme.title: Patrôl Pawennau
programme.desc: Mae'r Pawenlu yn darganfod cwch gwenyn yng ngoleudy Capten Cimwch. The PAW Patrol discovers a beehive in Cap'n Cimwch's lighthouse.

programme.title: Ahoi!
programme.desc: A fydd morladron Ysgol Pont Siôn Norton yn llwyddo i helpu Ben Dant a Cadi i drechu Capten Cnec a chipio'r ynys nôl? Will Ysgol Pont Siôn Norton's pirates succeed in helping Ben Dant & Cadi?

programme.title: Y Tralalas
programme.desc: Mae digon i'w wneud yn y Sw bob tro! Mae Harmoni, Melodi a Bop yn gweld llwyth o anifeiliaid ac yn dysgu am y rhai bach a mawr. Harmony, Melody and Bop learn more about zoo animals.

programme.title: Sam Tân
programme.desc: Mae Norman yn mynd i drafferthion wrth geisio cael ei ddraig i chwythu tân. Norman gets into trouble when he tries to get his dragon to breathe fire.

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Cyfres gomedi i blant meithrin sy'n cynnwys sgetsys, eitemau doniol, jôcs a chymeriadau dwl newydd sbon. A comedy show for pre-school children, full of sketches, jokes and fun!

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae Siôn awydd gwneud ffwl afal i'r bwyty, ond pan mae Menna'r afr yn bwyta'r afalau rhaid iddo ddod o hyd i gynhwysyn newydd. Siôn wants to make apple fool for his special of the day!

programme.title: Asra

programme.title: Of Human Bondage
programme.desc: 1934. Drama. Directed by John Cromwell. Stars Bette Davis, Leslie Howard & Frances Dee. A young man becomes attracted to a cold and unfeeling waitress who may ultimately destroy them both. [S]

programme.title: Inside The Room
programme.desc: 1935. Crime Drama. Directed by Leslie Hiscott of Mr. Pastry fame. Austin Trevor plays French sleuth, Pierre Santos, solving a series of murders. [S]

programme.title: The Texan
programme.desc: The Man Hater. 1959. Stars Rory Calhoun, Lori Nelson & William Tannen. Bill attempts to help a young woman who is fleeing from a gunfighter, but she's become bitter towards all men. [S]

programme.title: The Larkins
programme.desc: Country Style. 1964. Stars Peggy Mount, David Kossoff & Hugh Paddick. Ada insists on spending the summer holiday in a quiet country cottage, but the accommodation doesn't quite meet expectations. [S]

programme.title: Johnny Ringo
programme.desc: The Arrival. Directed by Aaron Spelling and starring Don Durant and Mark Goddard. Johnny Ringo, a gunslinger, is hired as the sheriff of Velardi, Arizona, a wide-open frontier town. [S]

programme.title: Hyde Park Corner
programme.desc: 1935. Drama. Directed by Sinclair Hill and starring Gordon Harker, Binnie Hale and Eric Portman. A duel is destined to be repeated when the two descendants of the original duel meet. [S]

programme.title: Faces in the Dark
programme.desc: 1960. Drama. Directed by David Eady. Starring John Gregson, Mai Zetterling & John Ireland. Richard, a factory owner, becomes blind during an experiment on the very day his wife wants a divorce. [S]

programme.title: Final Appointment
programme.desc: 1954. Crime. Director Terence Fisher and starring John Bentley. Reporters investigate threats against a retired army officer and discover links to a series of murders that occurred during the war. [S]

programme.title: Rogue's Yarn
programme.desc: 1956. Crime drama directed by Vernon Sewell. A husband plots to kill his rich wife. Does he have the perfect alibi? Starring Derek Bond and Hugh Latimer. [S]

programme.title: Two Wives at One Wedding
programme.desc: 1961. Crime. Directed by Montgomery Tully. Stars Gordon Jackson, Christina Gregg & Lisa Daniely. Tom's wedding day becomes a confusing nightmare when a stranger appears, claiming to be his wife. [S]

programme.title: The Undefeated
programme.desc: 1969. Western. Director: Andrew V. McLaglen. Stars John Wayne, Rock Hudson & Antonio Aguilar. An ex-union army officer and his confederate counterpart join forces to fight Mexican revolutionaries. [S]

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Critter Doctor. 1964. Stars Irene Ryan, Mark Goddard & Russell Collins. Granny gets frustrated when she confuses a house-to-house insecticide salesman with a critter doctor. [S]

programme.title: Scotland Yard
programme.desc: 1957. The Case of the Smiling Widow. Director: Montgomery Tully. Starring Russell Napier and Vernon Greeves. Police question the circumstances of an apparent death by taking one's own life.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Desert Justice. 1960. Stars Dan Blocker, Claude Atkins & Wesley Lau. Adam and Hoss become worried when a U.S. Marshal arrives to escort Dave to LA to face trial, so they ride along to protect him. [S]

programme.title: Out of Town
programme.desc: Brick Making/Stonehenge. 1986. After a visit to a brick maker in Dorset, Jack Hargreaves takes us to Salisbury Plain to witness sunrise at Stonehenge on a mid-winter's day. [S]

programme.title: The Footage Detectives
programme.desc: We go behind the scenes of 1930s chocolate box making, we join police trainees on the beat in 1950s Brighton, and we journey up north to Barnsley in the 50s to spot a famous face. [S]

programme.title: Public Eye
programme.desc: How About It, Frank? 1975. Detective & Mystery Drama. Stars Alfred Burke, Peter Childs & Ray McAnally. Ron Gash wants Marker as his new partner. But are Gash's methods compatible with Marker's? [S]

programme.title: Sapphire
programme.desc: 1959. Murder mystery. Directed by Basil Dearden and stars Nigel Patrick, Yvonne Mitchell and Michael Craig. Superintendent Robert Hazard investigates a murder, which could be racially motivated. [S]

programme.title: Castaway (1986)
programme.desc: 1986. Adventure. Director: Nicolas Roeg. Stars Oliver Reed, Amanda Donohoe & Georgina Hale. A young woman seeking adventure volunteers to spend a year on a deserted island with a middle aged man. [S]

programme.title: Castaway (1986)
programme.desc: 1986. Adventure. Director: Nicolas Roeg. Stars Oliver Reed, Amanda Donohoe & Georgina Hale. A young woman seeking adventure volunteers to spend a year on a deserted island with a middle aged man. [S]

programme.title: Black Tuesday
programme.desc: 1954. Drama. Directed by Hugo Fregonese. Stars Edward G. Robinson, Jean Parker & Peter Graves. A death row inmate breaks free on the eve of his execution, but will the law catch up with him?

programme.title: Boy Who Caught a Crook
programme.desc: 1961. Family. Directed by Edward L. Cahn. Stars Wanda Hendrix, Don Beddoe & Roger Mobley. A young newsboy becomes the target of a bank robber after he finds a suitcase full of money. [S]

programme.title: It Rained Three Times Last Year
programme.desc: An insightful documentary about the people who live and work within the Sahara Desert, with an additional glimpse at the means of transport used to travel across the vast land.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: John Wesley Hardin. 1955. Stars Hugh O'Brian, Phillip Pine & Barbara Bestar. John Wesley Hardin comes to Wichita seeking revenge against Wyatt for throwing his friend out of town. [S]

programme.title: Music Hall
programme.desc: 1934. Musical. Director: John Baxter. Stars George Carney, Ben Field, Mark Daly & Helena Pickard. A rare film put out by Twickenham Film Studios which includes many original music hall acts. [S]

programme.title: Operation Diplomat
programme.desc: 1953. Crime. Directed by John Guillermin. Stars Guy Rolfe, Lisa Daniely, Patricia Dainton. A surgeon is forced to operate on an injured man by a gang of smugglers. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life The Old School
programme.desc: ... Tie. 1962. A brilliant visit to three of the most famous public schools, showing their background and prospects for the future.

programme.title: Girdle of Gold
programme.desc: 1952. Comedy directed by Montgomery Tully and filmed at Nettlefold. Starring Esmond Knight and Maudie Edwards. A husband hides a fortune in his wife's girdle, only for the girdle to go 'missing'. [S]

programme.title: Cat & Mouse
programme.desc: 1958. Crime Thriller. Directed by Paul Rotha with Lee Patterson. The daughter of a convicted and executed killer believes she has murdered blackmailer Hilton Edwards. [S]

programme.title: Crooks Anonymous
programme.desc: 1962. Comedy. Directed by Ken Annakin. Stars Leslie Phillips, Stanley Baxter & Wilfrid Hyde-White. Petty thief, Dandy Forsdyke, joins an unofficial organisation for reforming criminals. [S]

programme.title: How You See It
programme.desc: 1950. A remarkable short film about the basics of how movie film projection deceives the eye.

programme.title: They Came From Beyond Space
programme.desc: 1967. Sci-Fi. Director: Freddie Francis. Stars: Robert Hutton, Jennifer Jayne, Zia Mohyeddin & Bernard Kay. Scientists investigating an unusual meteor shower are possessed by an alien force. [S]

programme.title: Cash on Demand
programme.desc: 1961. Drama. Directed by Quentin Lawrence. Stars Peter Cushing, Andre Morell & Richard Vernon. A crook abducts the wife and child of a bank manager and then schemes to rob the institution. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life For Crying Out
programme.desc: ... Loud. 1964. A fascinating survey of the advertising industry, with a focus on how it works and what it does.

programme.title: The Edgar Wallace Mystery Theatre
programme.desc: The Double. 1963. Directed by Lionel Harris. Stars Jeanette Sterke, Robert Brown & Basil Henson. John Cleeve is suffering from 'Homicidal Hallucinations' and can't remember his past. [S]

programme.title: Four Star Playhouse
programme.desc: 1953. Drama. Director: Robert Florey. Stars Merle Oberon, Gordon Oliver & Barbara Billingsley. A woman secretly gets a hearing aid, then learns of her husband's affair and his plan to murder her. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: Hizzonner the Penguin. 1966. Stars Adam West & Burgess Meredith. Suspiciously endearing himself to the citizens of Gotham by foiling a robbery, the Penguin announces he is running for mayor. [S]

programme.title: Dial 999
programme.desc: Exception to the Rule. 1958. Stars Robert Beatty, Paul Whitsun-Jones & Clive Cazes. In accordance to the rules, police officers are unarmed; an exception to the rule is essential in this case. [S]

programme.title: Where Has Poor Mickey Gone?
programme.desc: Unseen for years this strange, B-Picture oddity sees Warren Mitchell superb as fairground magician Emilio Dinelli, tormented by a gang of rowdies who take him prisoner in his backstreet workshop. [S]

programme.title: Bob & Carol & Ted & Alice
programme.desc: 1969. Comedy Drama. Directed by Paul Mazursky. Stars Natalie Wood, Elliott Gould, Robert Culp & Dyan Cannon. Two couples find liberation in the Sexual Revolution of the 1960s. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Join Caroline Munro for an evening of horrifying science fiction delights. First up, is the 1985 sci-fi horror Lifeforce featuring British theatrical greats Frank Finlay and Patrick Stewart. [S]

programme.title: Lifeforce
programme.desc: 1985. Horror. Directed by Tobe Hooper. Stars Steve Railsback, Mathilda May & Patrick Stewart. A space shuttle mission investigating Halley's Comet brings back a malevolent race of space vampires. [S]

programme.desc: Voyage of the Golden Asteroid: Newton is desperate to study a rare asteroid, but Pirate Robot has seen it too and he is planning a hijack! (S5 Ep26)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Luna's Mega Moth: Luna Girl wants to get back at Motsuki and get to the moon - by badness and deviousness. (S5 Ep27)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Captain Pirate Robot: To get his ship back from Octobella, Pirate Robot becomes the captain of the PJMs. But can he be a good captain? (S5 Ep28)

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: Raiders of the Lost Shell: Rocky plays with Tiny's cymbal shell without asking and breaks it. Tiny is upset and Rocky is determined to replace it. (S3 Ep35)

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: Fantastic Stories: Rocky sees the attention the babies give to Giganto and gets jealous. Rocky thinks they shouldn't idolize Giganto; they should idolize him (then he'll idolize Giganto). (S3 Ep36)

programme.title: DinoCity
programme.desc: Naughty Kraken: Kraken is the favourite pet of the Saur family! He follows Ricky and Tyra everywhere. This time, Kraken was playing with them in the yard. And then he got lost! (S2 Ep26)

programme.title: DinoCity
programme.desc: The Bicycle: Ricky dreamed of learning to ride a two-wheeled bike! He wanted to roam all over DinoCity with his friend Boo and hear the wind whistle past his ears! (S2 Ep1)

programme.title: DinoCity
programme.desc: The Amusement Park: The Saur family is off to the amusement park! Everyone's looking forward to a fun day out, only Tyra is preoccupied by something. It's her friend Elvira. (S2 Ep2)

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: The Ghost Ball: In the king's castle, a ghost is organising a ball for ghosts, but he realizes he doesn't have a band! He tries to ask Molang and Piu Piu, but forgets he frightens everyone. (S5 Ep8)

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: The Club: Molang and Piu Piu meet a tribe of friends who solve everything with their clubs. Both will have to show the tribe there are other ways to solve their issues. (S5 Ep9)

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: Iron Piu Piu: Molang, Piu Piu and some friends are working on a building site, but the work is exhausting for small Piu Piu. An engineer offers him a robotic armour to work faster. (S5 Ep10)

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: The Plant: As Molang and Piu Piu are preparing a potion to cure the king's mosquito bites, they discover an adorable plant... that's also a carnivore. (S5 Ep11)

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: The Coconut War: After a coconut fight, Molang and Piu Piu are stranded on two different islands. They will have to reconcile two fighting people and show them what coconuts are really for. (S5 Ep12)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Snowman Who Didn't Want To Melt: It's winter, but there's still no snow. How disappointing... Ollie paints the sky grey, and suddenly, there's a snowstorm. (S1 Ep34)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Costume Contest: There's a costume contest at school, but it's off to a bad start: Petula didn't get the princess costume she wanted. (S1 Ep35)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Other Side Of The Mirror: A lot of weird things are happening to the MiniWhats today. It reminds Mixo of a story: the story of the little girl on the other side of the mirror. (S1 Ep36)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Fountain Of Bad Luck: Mustard isn't lucky, although he doesn't believe in bad-luck or good-luck charms. However, when Petula finds a four-leaf clover, he wants to keep it for himself. (S1 Ep37)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Rabbit Who Thought He Was A Chicken: It's not Easter, but the MiniWhats are wondering if there are chocolate chickens inside chocolate eggs (and vice versa). (S1 Ep38)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Storm-A-Lert: In the middle of an approaching storm, Miguel rushes through his important jobs so he can work on his new invention. (S1 Ep47)

programme.desc: A young orphan girl Justine falls into a world of cruel depravity while her sister Juliette thrives in vice. Adaptation of de Sade's novel. Contains distressing scenes and nudity.
